PLOT
After being captured by Turks during the Crusades,Robin of Locksley and a Moor,Azeem,escape back to England where Azeem vows to remain until he repays Robin for saving his life.Meanwhile,Robin&#039;s father has been murdered by the Sheriff of Nottingham and when Robin returns home he vows to avenge his father&#039;s death. Eventhough Marian,his childhood friend,cannot help him,he escapes to the Forest of Sherwood where he joins a band of exiled villagers and becomes their leader.With their help he attempts to cleanse the land of the evil that the Sheriff has spread.
